name: mega-cuff
effect: Unused. This appears as the boy player’s Mega Bracelet in Pokémon Contests, but it cannot actually be obtained.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This bracelet contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This bracelet contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This bracelet contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
